articles.author: Andrew Backhouse
articles.title: China's fury at Lithuania over Taiwan, warns country to 'pay the price for its evil deed' - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: China has labelled a tiny European country "evil" - for the use of a single word.
articles.content:
Chinese state media has targeted Lithuania. Photo / Google MapsChina has unleashed on the tiny European country of Lithuania over Taiwan.

articles.author: Evening Standard
articles.title: Met Office warns of 50C summers following record-breaking temperatures - Evening Standard
articles.description: Met Office forecasters have predicted Europe could soon  see 50C temperatures during summer  after a record-breaking August.
articles.content:
This week, temperatures in Syracuse in Sicily, Italy, exceeded the previous record of the highest temperature seen in Europe with the mercury hitting 48.8°C.
The previous record of 48.0°C was set in… [+1177 chars]

articles.title: COVID-19 vaccines now mandatory for all B.C. long-term and assisted living staff - Global News
articles.description: Several major European countries, including France, Italy and Greece, have already implemented mandatory vaccines.
articles.content:
B.C. health officials announced new orders Thursday that everyone who works in long-term care and assisted living facilities in the province must be vaccinated against COVID-19.
